title: people like this...
body:
... should be banned.

So I was playing well, 7 game winning streak, but I knew it wasn't going to last for long.

There it was, our jungler banned my Xin Zhao mid which I had hovered in champ select. I then proceed to change my pick and hover soraka to get them to dodge. But this person, this person...was different.

Them -  being first pick - instalock soraka, now no one on my team was dodging and I couldn't garuntee that the last person would leave. All that was left was me in my promos. Our soraka was going to troll most likely to get one of us to dodge since they were probably filled into an off role. I took the bullet for my team and this person went off happily ever after. Fortunately, I won the game after that and got promoted.

Abusing the system like this and making other people take your LP losses, queue time penalties, and promo losses should be a bannable offense, who knows how many other summoners were affected by this players actions and behaviours aside from myself.

Rujitra isn't a moderator. Specialists are normal forum users with a fancy name tag.

Back to topic, this is why I miss team builder so much. Games are so much nicer when the entire team agrees from the start.
I definitely agree, however I wasn't around during the team builder era so I wouldn't know what League was like during that time.

Basically, everyone had unlimited free champion select dodges. So, if you didn't like the team composition, you were either kicked from or left the group. I played support a lot, so my queues were instant (5 seconds max) and my time to game was mainly dependent on myself.

So you dodged because you didn't like someone else's champion ban/pick **choice**? It's their choice not yours.

You're right, people like you should be punished for trying to exert control on others and wasting people's time.

Yes, I did not like that my fellow teammate banned the champion that I was going to play and hovered to let them know before hand. 

They did not provide any communication about why they had done so.

They then selected my soraka after I hovered it immediately following them banning Xin Zhao.

I did not dodge because of who they banned but because of their clearly toxic behavior. They were going to troll so I dodged. Learn to read before you comment kid. Also how they hell am I wasting others peoples time by dodging a clearly trolled game, if you don't find soraka jungle a little suspicious in a ranked game then you need to get off the boards and back on the rift again.

This still doesn't avoid the question at hand. You attempted to exert control over other players because of a ban you didn't like. He then did the same to you when you appeared to be displaying toxic behavior. If you believe the other person should be punished, then so should you. 

The other thing you could have done is communicate with that player in a mature manner. If they did indeed prove to be toxic, then you report them at the end of play for any number of options.

You're going to find players that do this. That's what the report system is in place for. Ultimately, it's not going to impact your placement very much, as you will climb only up to where your skill level caps out. One game out of 10 you had a negative experience. I say that's not half bad in a community rife with toxic players. You just learn to shrug it off, take a break, or become toxic yourself. Hopefully, you don't fall into the latter.

Thanks for the response. They banned who I hovered then chose the second champion I hovered afterward which made them a soraka jungler. I believe he read what you posted. It's easy to see. I don't think you understand what he was saying. You really don't understand what the other player was doing. Perhaps he bans Xin most games, and didn't want the other team to pick him first. Perhaps he's really good at Soraka jungle and has stats to back this up. The point of the post is that you don't really know and are just making speculation based on minimal information. Both Xin mid and Soraka jungle are not meta, and thus are typically called troll picks. In higher elo, both can easily be punished. He was using sarcasm to show that you were just speculating.

Overall, it's not worth getting this upset over. People are going to troll. People are going to dodge. Best just to move on.

I checked their op.gg beforehand and they were an absolute feeder. Also, what a coincidence it would be if they ban Xin most games considering that they main adc (and are definitely not good at it according to their stats) + it's pretty ironic that they would be really good at soraka jungle considering that they are an iron player and that both of those champions that they picked and banned were previously hovered by the exact same player in champ select.

Overall, I completely agree with what you have said and should move on even though you still misinterpreted the post which is probably my fault by the way I worded it. 

+ You used the term " He " to describe the player when their gender wasn't specified (gender bias confirmed) lol xd
